meanings: so, in that way, like that

vlive.korean: 저렇게... - 보이나요? Like that... - Can you see it? 듣기 View video NU'EST : 뉴이스트와 스푼즈가 함께하는 Special V LIVE [THE NU'STORE]
vlive.english: Like that... - Can you see it?

vlive.korean: 아니 근데 목소리가 왜 저렇게 귀여워 다미야? But why is your voice so cute, Dami? 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] DREAMCATCHER X Rooftop Live - 드림캐쳐의 루프탑라이브!
vlive.english: But why is your voice so cute, Dami?

vlive.korean: "쟤(쿠기)는 몇 개월 만에 저렇게 돼?" "Can he(Coogie) do that just in several months?" 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 25. 내.전.힙 마지막회! 츄플과 래빈의 코디는 누구?!
vlive.english: "Can he(Coogie) do that just in several months?"

vlive.korean: 뭐가 저렇게 동그래? How come it's round like that? 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : TO DO X TOMORROW X TOGETHER 2020 - EP.6
vlive.english: How come it's round like that?

vlive.korean: [억울] 물이 저렇게 맑은데! [Sad] The water is so clear! 듣기 View video TWICE : 나연 TV “나연이 하와이 갔나연?” EP.01
